tool_description: Official Postal Ninja tracking API for developers
name: Postal Ninja
title: Postal Ninja

api_list.name: createTrack
api_list.description: Returns ID of newly created package (status=CREATED) or stored ID if this tracking number already exists (status=FOUND).

utterances.utterance: Track the package with the tracking number 123456789.
Can you create a tracking entry for the package with the code ABC123XYZ?
I need to track a package using the tracking number 987654321 and the carrier ID USPS.
Please track the package with the number XYZ987654 and the destination country code US.
Create a tracking entry for the package with the tracking number 1122334455 and the carrier ID FedEx.
Track the package with the code 9988776655 and the destination country code CA.
I need to track a package with the tracking number 5544332211, the carrier ID DHL, and the destination country code DE.
Please create a tracking entry for the package with the number 6677889900.
Track the package with the tracking number 3344556677 and the carrier ID UPS.
I need to track a package with the code 7788990011 and the destination country code GB.

api_list.name: refreshTrack
api_list.description: Submits on-demand refresh request to tracking engine for package with given ID. Please note, that packages in ACTIVE list are auto-tracked regularly so you don't need to do this for such packages.

api_list.name: moveTrack
api_list.description: Moves package with given ID to ARCHIVED, TRASHED or back to ACTIVE list.
